Your name is JADE HARLEY and you're getting ready for a Halloween party at your friend’s house. You already have an amazing idea for what to dress up as this year, and Dave and Karkat will be going along with it! They don’t really know that yet, but you’re sure they’ll love it.
Gosh, you’re practically shaking with excitement! It’s been a long time since your friends all got together for a party like this. The last time you can recall that happening was John’s first birthday on this planet! That sure was a night you aren’t going to forget.

It’s perfect! You’re honestly surprised you hadn’t thought of this years ago. Sure, this costume’s PREDICTABILITY LEVELS may be absolutely off the charts, yet you can hardly find it in yourself to care too much. What you can find in yourself, however, are some even more perfect costume ideas for Dave and Karkat.

You’d better hurry up and grab their outfits from the other closet, time’s running out and those two have a tendency to drag literally every interaction on for much longer than is actually necessary!

halloween.command: [I] John: Be the Adorable Little Dragon.
halloween.body:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/halloweenspecial2020/029.gif[/img]

You are now THE FEROCIOUS LITTLE DRAGON, or as everyone else likes to call you, CASEY, also known as VICEROY BUBBLES VON SALAMANCER. You aren’t exactly sure what you’re supposed to be doing at a party. Maybe you could just waddle around like always, asking people for uppies…
Yes, that sounds like a good idea.

What's this? Could it be... no, it can't be. There's no way. You refuse to believe that what you're witnessing in front of you is real. It's the remarkably empowering feeling of NARRATIVE AGENCY! Just look at all those different options! Six whole character pairs just ripe for your keen, professional reader's eyes to peer upon at your own leisure! Okay, don't get too power hungry just yet. Take your time, look upon this startlingly wide panel and make an educated decision as to which pair you'd like to witness interacting first. There's no rush. You're in control now, at least for the pages spread across this decision-based batch of pages.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/halloweenspecial2020/030.gif[/img]
[color=#0715cd]JOHN: so.. JOHN: what are you even supposed to be? JOHN: something about it is familiar.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: It’s my outfit from when I went trickster.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: trickster?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Do you not know what that is.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: i don’t think so, no.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: The long and short is it’s a twisted sugar-high drug trip.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: ...lovely.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: It’s something from the game, I’m surprised you don’t have any recollection of such a thing.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: we were in different sessions, dummy.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: The likelihood that you’d experience something akin to what I did is pretty high, even so.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: but there are also, like, a bajillion things that could happen in the game.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Semantics. DIRK: Anyway, you said you recognized the costume?[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: only a little. JOHN: it kinda reminds me of something from way back at the beginning of the game, before i really had any concept of what was going on. JOHN: i vaguely remember getting really happy all at once, and then...blacking out? JOHN: oh jeez, that sounds really concerning when i say it out loud.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: No, dude, you went through what my costume is.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: oh...what?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: You probably went trickster, bro. DIRK: Not that it’s particularly important you know that, since it was so long ago and you remember a grand total of Jack Shit about what happened. DIRK: It’s best you just take my colorful costume at face value. DIRK: I digress.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: ok then, um. JOHN: why’d you wear it, anyhow?[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/halloweenspecial2020/031.gif[/img]
[color=#f2a400]DIRK: Just a sec.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: uh.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/halloweenspecial2020/032A.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/halloweenspecial2020/032B.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/halloweenspecial2020/033.gif[/img]
[color=#f2a400]DIRK: What were you sayin’?[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: just asking why you chose to wear the trickster outfit.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Ah, yes. DIRK: I didn’t want to wear any costume in the first place. DIRK: What, shield my identity behind a ridiculous get-up with no real work put into it to celebrate the 24 hours of a juvenile and superfluous holiday? I do that everyday, anyway. I don’t need it physically manifested.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: damn, are you the grinch of halloween or some shit?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I guess I never thought of it that way. DIRK: That’s not important. Jane wanted me to wear a costume, so here I am.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: that doesn’t seem like a very pleasant costume, if your experience with “going trickster” is anything like mine.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I... DIRK: Oh, man. DIRK: Fucking god dammit.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: what?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: You’re definitely right, for fuck’s sake. DIRK: God dammit, insensitive piece of shit...[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: right about...what. JOHN: what?? JOHN: i can’t see into your head, dude. you’re having a completely out of context crisis right now.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: It’s stupid, agh. Whatever, don’t worry about it. DIRK: It’s just...Jane, Roxy and Jake had a much different trickster high than me. DIRK: They did a lot of things they regret, and I don’t think having me dressed as a walking reminder of said regrets is exactly pleasant for them. DIRK: Jane asked me to wear a costume after I paraded around angrily like an unwilling infant and then I pull out this shit? DIRK: I guess it simply slipped my mind, but—[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: woah, dude, slow down. JOHN: i’m sure it’s fine. no one has said anything yet. JOHN: they probably won’t even notice. JOHN: ... JOHN: hm. JOHN: why was your trickster experience so different from theirs?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I’m not really sure. DIRK: Trickster mode is supposed to make you reckless and lose your inhibitions. DIRK: But it just made me nihilistic and defeatist.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: maybe that’s just how you get when you lose your inhibitions.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I... DIRK: I think that’s enough brain-picking from you, Egbert.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: i was just making conversation. JOHN: you’re not mad or anything, right?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: No, I’m not mad. That’d be a rather ridiculous thing to get mad about.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: ok. JOHN: y’know, uh. JOHN: you were, uh. JOHN: there was a time, um, not... JOHN: ...never mind, it’s not important.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Okay?[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: good talk![/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Okay, then...see you arou—and he’s gone.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/006.gif[/img]

Sellin’ these beautiful wares. Fuckin’ joyous occupation. Fondness for selling various Creator-themed holiday goods has run in your family for generations. Your great great grandmother even said it’s been running in the family for all 5005 years of this planet’s existence!

You have perfected the art of selling wares. So perfected is your talent for it that calling it perfected almost feels like an understatement! Nobody ever walks by your stands and escapes with their wallet intact. Nobody.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/007.gif[/img]

Oh my gods. Is that who you think it is? Could it be? Have four of the Creators shown up to celebrate the holiday celebrating most of their birthdays? No, surely they must be a group of people in costume.

Yes. That strikes you as the most logical explanation to what you are seeing.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/008A.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/008B.gif[/img]

They noticed you! Why are you feeling so nervous about this, they’re just a couple of people wearing silly costumes for the holiday! Like one of those mythical “Mall Santas” you’ve heard legends about from Earth A and Earth B times!

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/009.gif[/img]

Here they come! Better get your gameface on, these people are obviously very big fans of the Creators and must have very high standards for merchandise based around their favorites.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/010.gif[/img] It’s a figure of speech, you don’t actually have a gameface to put on! However, you cannot deny that would be a very nice thing to have. You spend just a bit too long mentally humoring the idea. Oh, here they are! Hello there, may you interest these fine folk in any of your high-quality wares solely themed around the Day of the Creators?
[color=#4ac925] JADE: woah! this stuff is so neat! JADE: awww rose look at that, they have your signature on a sweater [/color] [color=#b536da] ROSE: Charming. ROSE: It does look fairly comfortable, but I can’t deny that it may feel just a bit egotistical to wear a sweater with my own name lovingly plastered on it. [/color] [color=#e00707] DAVE: yeah hey uh humble question DAVE: how much are the dave strider hoodies DAVE: ill take ten of them [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/011.gif[/img]

Wow, that was quite a few boons worth of wares you just sold right there! But that’s only one out of these four folk, you’re sure you can get more boons out of this! Gotta keep the business afloat after all.

christmas.command: [I] HS: Sell to the boy dressed as the Heir of Breath.
christmas.body:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/012.gif[/img] You there! Boy! He looks like he has a stellar taste in Heir-themed apparel! May you interest him in one of your mockup pogo hammers? Or, if he’s feeling especially eccentric today, a replica Wrinklefucker? Guaranteed to be produced through only the utmost quality of alchemy replacements!
[color=#0715cd] JOHN: oh, um... JOHN: i already own both of those things, but i guess supporting some local business couldn’t hurt. JOHN: they do look pretty accurate, too. [/color]
Ah, you see! A fine connoisseur of Heir merchandise. You’re certain he’ll find only the most satisfactory of experiences with your hammer replicas!

christmas.command: [I] HS: Market towards the Seer of Light girl.
christmas.body:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/013.gif[/img] You can tell this fine lady has immaculate taste in anything and everything to do with the Seer of Light. Now you know she isn’t the biggest fan of the signature design, so how about you offer her a Light-themed hoodie? They’re so comfy you’d swear they were alchemized directly from the Seer of Light’s godly robes themselves!
[color=#b536da] ROSE: Hm, why not? ROSE: I could always use another sweater. I’ll take one, thank you. [/color]

christmas.command: [I] HS: Bargain with the Witch lookalike.
christmas.body:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/014.gif[/img] How about this young lady? You’ve gotta say, her Witch of Space outfit is already top notch! Those who dress up as her tend to have issues making the dog ears look realistic, but she’s pulled it off incredibly well. Perhaps you can interest her in a plushie of the mythical first guardian Becquerel?
[color=#4ac925] JADE: oh my god yes you very much could interest me!!! JADE: this is the best plushie ive ever seen JADE: thank you so much!!!!! [/color]

christmas.command: [I] HS: Reap the rewards of a successful business day.
christmas.body:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/015.gif[/img]

Uhm, ma’am? The plush only costs- welp there she goes. It’s about time you close up shop anyway, the celebration’s going to finish up shortly. Today has been one successful business day! Probably the most successful business day you can recall in recent history. Thank the gods for cosplayers, huh?

Perhaps you’ll invest all this extra money you got today into expanding your business. And, if you really want to start dreaming big, finally break the 5005 year long tradition of operating out of simple stands at various celebrations! Hah, one can only dream.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/016.gif[/img]

A young man sleeps in his bedroom. It just so happens that today—wait, what day is it, again? No matter, it’s probably not that important. Anyways, what is the name of this young man?
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/003.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/004.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/005.gif[/img]

Your name is JOHN EGBERT. You’ve yet to learn what day it is, since you kind of lost track of time ages ago. So, you always have to check your trusty and handy calendar that you neatly keep next to your bed at all times.
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/006.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/007.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/008.gif[/img]

Do your eyes deceive you? Or is today truly the 13th of April, aka your BIRTHDAY. Today is also the birthday of your ectobiological mother. Which reminds you, you will be having a birthday party at her place today.
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/009.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/010.gif[/img]

Walking over to your wardrobe with the intent to change into something a little bit more formal, you find a letter on the wardrobe from your roommate, Terezi.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/011.gif[/img]
[color=#008282]D34R JOHN, 1M L3TT1NG YOU KNOW, TH4T I W1LL B3 GON3 FOR, POSS1BLY, S3V3R4L D4YS, S1NC3 M3 4ND K4N4Y4 4R3 GO1NG TO B3 W4TCH1NG MOV13S TOG3TH3R, 4ND KNOW1NG M3, 1 WOULD PROB4BLY P4SS OUT 4FT3R TH3 F1RST THR33 MOV13S, SO YOU COULD JUST C4LL TH1S 4 SL33POV3R H3H3. 4NYW4YS, S1NC3 1 C4NT B3 TH3R3 ON TH3 13TH 1M GONN4 W1SH YOU 4 H4PPY WR1GGL1NG D4Y NOW, OR 4 “H4PPY B1RTHD4Y” 4S YOU HUM4NS C4LL 1T. W31RDOS. SO, H4PPY B1RTHD4Y JOHN!! 1M GONN4 T4K3 YOU OUT TO KNOCK OV3R SOM3 TR4SHC4NS FOR YOUR B1RTHD4Y WH3N 1 G3T B4CK, SO DONT GO W1THOUT M3 >:][/color]
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/012.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/013.gif[/img]
[color=#0715cd]JOHN: i’m not sure what i was expecting. JOHN: at least the letter’s nice.[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/014.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/015.gif[/img]

Ah, you almost forgot. Feigning the hustle of a rush, you grab your neatly packaged gift you’ve prepared for Jane and scurry out the door.
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/016.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/017.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/021A.gif[/img] [img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/021B.gif[/img]
[color=#00d5f2]JANE: Oh!! JANE: Salutations, everyone. I am just delighted you all could make it![/color] [color=#209401]JAKE: I couldnt dare miss this event. Why id be up to my neck in cake batter if i even thought of it! [/color] [color=#b536da]ROSE: We’re delighted to be here, Jane.[/color]
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/022.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/023.gif[/img]
[color=#00d5f2]JANE: Please, please, have a seat! Make yourselves at home. JANE: I think we have just about everyone now. JANE: Of course, except the belle of the ball himself. JANE: Not a problem. JANE: Let me see who’s here, one...two...three...[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/024.gif[/img]
[color=#00d5f2]JANE: Oh, why, speak of the devil.[/color] [color=#b536da]ROSE: I ponder the boundless possibilities of who could be at the door.[/color] [color=#4ac925]JADE: hmmm JADE: i think it might just be the birthday boy! [/color]

[color=#0715cd]JOHN: love what you did with the place. JOHN: all birthday-y.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Articulate as always, John. JANE: Jokes aside, thank you. I enjoy decorating. JANE: Who knows, maybe this was my true calling all along.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: cake decorating is a thing, right?[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Oh, how could I have forgotten. JANE: Ignore my previous statement. I know my calling.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: hehe, alright, then. JOHN: you excited?[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Is that even a question? Another birthday I get to spend with my lovely ecto son and my friends? JANE: It’s going to be a blast.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: not even thinking about the existential dread of adding another year to your life by a quantifiable number?[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: You need to stop hanging out with Rose so much.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: you’re just intimidated that i’m using big boy words.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Are you even sure you know what those “big boy words” mean?[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: yes, jane, i know what they mean. i’m not five. existential dread means dread right now![/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: I suppose that’s close enough.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: close enough? that was the right definition.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: If you say so, hoo hoo.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/029.gif[/img]
[color=00d5f2]JANE: Here you are, everyone. JANE: A slice of cake I prepared for the party, just for each of you. JANE: Enjoy![/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/030.gif[/img]

Woah! You are suddenly the little salamander everyone keeps ignoring. Your name is CASEY, or, in some households; VICEROY BUBBLES VON SALAMANCER. Today is one of your parents and his ectobiological mother’s birthday. So, you made them a nice little birthday card, but you have to wait a few more pages until you can give it to them. You are way too excited to show them your homemade gift, so you decide to go around and bother everyone with your presence once again.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/031.gif[/img]
[color=00d5f2]JANE: Hello, Roxy. JANE: It feels like it’s been far too long since we’ve sat down and properly talked.[/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: yeah uve totes got that right ROXY: weve both been like uber busy ive been DYING for a break[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Incredibly so.[/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: anyways hows it feel to bake a cake outside of work again[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Oh, just wondrous! JANE: Especially since I’m the one who gets to eat it after, hoo hoo![/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: OMG thats so true ROXY: i wish i could just fuckin eat cake for my job ROXY: actually now that i think bout it people would probably watch that lmao[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: I know I would. JANE: What is that called again?[/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: gosh janey always outta tha loop but ROXY: anyways thats not important rn ROXY: that cake u made? fuckin 10 whole smackeroos ROXY: ur gonna phatten me up like that granny from that one story or smth[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Thank you very much, Roxy. JANE: It’s chocolate, John’s favorite.[/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: doesnt john not like cake[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Hmm...it may not be his food of choice, no. JANE: But, it can grow on him![/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: he didnt eat his slice[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Semantics.[/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: lmao ROXY: but yuh ROXY: happy birthday janey[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Thank you![/color] [color=ff6ff2]ROXY: word ROXY: cheers to livin[/color] [color=00d5f2]JANE: Cheers![/color]

JOHN: i’m excited to get my presents and stuff.[/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: ooh JADE: i think youre gonna be really happy with the presents we got you![/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: now i really can’t wait to open it! JOHN: i know i’m not supposed to ask this, but... JOHN: i might just get casey to spy and see what you guys got me.[/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: that is ALSO against the rules john! that would ruin the fun JADE: but i wonder what she would be thinking [/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: that’s...an interesting topic, actually. JOHN: is she even capable of thought as complex as us humans are?[/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: well she is a salamander isnt she? JADE: i doubt she can think thoughts as complex as ours[/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: well, you would be surprised. the antics she pulls off are not to be underestimated, that’s for sure. [/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: so you mean shes a prankster?[/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: not exactly. but she does dabble in the dark arts, occasionally.[/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: oh JADE: thats definitely from rose isnt it[/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: you bet! JOHN: what she does with those dark arts is probably from me though, hehe. JOHN: so, maybe she is a prankster! i hope that isn’t a bad thing.[/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: it isnt! this just means we have yet another handful to deal with JADE: and i mean that lovingly of course![/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: you really are just coming for my throat, here. JADE: oh whatever :p JADE: despite your suggested mischievous escapades JADE: have a happy birthday john[/color] [color=0715cd]JOHN: thanks, jade.[/color] [color=4ac925]JADE: of course[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/413special2021/035.gif[/img]
[color=b536da]ROSE: Father mine.[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: Daughter mine.[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: Pleasant outing.[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: You could say. DIRK: It’s always a treat to see Jane enjoying her birthday, considering some unfortunate past events.[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: Nice to know such things don’t dampen her ability to indulge in the occasion, now.[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: Yeah. DIRK: Additional friends help mask the tang of sour tastes, too. DIRK: That being, sharing this birthday with John probably makes it easier for her to swallow.[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: Of course. ROSE: Speaking of additional friends; ROSE: Is it still strange for you being around all these people?[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: It’d be pretty damn pathetic if there was no change at all throughout the years. DIRK: What kind of stick up my ass would I have to have to be so unwilling to soften myself amongst a group? DIRK: A motherfuckin’ treetrunk, that’s what.[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: No shame in cutting some slack for yourself. ROSE: I, for one, would find even a near immeasurable amount of improvement still worthy of more than a snide jab at your own pathetic nature.[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: Would you give yourself the same leeway?[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: Yes, I’m not *illogical*. I’ll give myself credit when credit is due. ROSE: As someone who likes to think of himself as a logician as well, you do frequently find yourself searching for holes to use as a mechanism for self deprecation.[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: Oh, no, no. We are not doing this today.[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: We already have. It’s done. ROSE: Rose: 5, Dirk: 0.[/color] [color=f2a400]DIRK: There’s no way I have zero points.[/color] [color=b536da]ROSE: You only ever recite to me what I am already knowledgeable of. ROSE: Ineffective analyzing of the psychological variety. ROSE: Dirk: 0.[/color]

You can not believe this. Now you have to wait even longer to get yourself some attention for once. You gotta wait for the others to give their presents to John and Jane before you can even dream of a chance.
